subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A four-year baseball odyssey that took Gabe Kapler as far east as Tokyo, as far south as Greenville, S.C., as far up as a manager’s job and as far down as Class A baseball.
snippet: A four-year baseball odyssey that took Gabe Kapler as far east as Tokyo, as far south as Greenville, S.C., as far up as a manager’s job and as far down as Class A baseball.
